events.event: Skunk Works founded by Kelly Johnson at Lockheed Aircraft
P-80 Shooting Star: First operational jet fighter delivered
U-2 spy plane first flight - CIA reconnaissance aircraft
Gary Powers U-2 shootdown over Soviet Union - program revealed
SR-71 Blackbird first flight - Mach 3+ reconnaissance
Have Blue stealth demonstrator first flight (F-117 precursor)
F-117 Nighthawk first flight (classified, not revealed until 1988)
F-117 stealth fighter publicly revealed (7 years after first flight)
Kelly Johnson dies - Ben Rich becomes legendary Skunk Works director
F-117 combat debut in Gulf War - first stealth aircraft combat operations
Aurora program rumors - alleged hypersonic reconnaissance aircraft (officially denied)
Lockheed Martin merger - Skunk Works continues as advanced development programs
Ben Rich dies - alleged deathbed statements about 'ET technology' and UFOs
Continued classified programs - full scope unknown, occasional leaks and speculation
